description:
The leading WebAssembly Runtime supporting WASI and Emscripten

Wasmer is a fast and secure WebAssembly runtime that enables super lightweight containers to run anywhere: from Desktop to the Cloud, Edge and IoT devices.
This release mostly consists of bug fixes and clean ups.
Added
- #5259 Fix alignment and padding of the WASIX snapshot type to align with wasix-libc
- #5236 feat(benches): Add compilation benches, use remote artifacts
- #5230 fix(llvm): Fix ADD_ABS_LO12_NC relocation
- #5226 Add make target for building wasmer-api with js feature as cdylib
Changed
- #4997 Rework WasiFs to use a "holey" FdList instead of hashmap + seed + freâ€¦
- #5257 ci: update CONTRIBUTING.md reference
- #5250 deps: Remove usage of unmaintained derivative crate
- #5256 deps: Upgrade wcgi crates to 0.3.0
- #5253 chore(wasix): Downgrade debug logs to trace
- #5245 Relax wat version requirement
- #5244 Alias . to cwd in wasi env
- #5225 Move compilation types inside of wasmer compiler
Fixed
- #5268 Fix musl builds
- #5231 Fix LLVM detection
- #5235 c-api/README.md: Fix double include in usage section
- #5238 Revert "Fix handling of the root dir in path_create_directory and get_inode_at_path_inner"
- #5237 Fix handling of the root dir in path_create_directory and get_inode_at_path_inner
